thread.section_title: Samuels Vehicle Hire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Samuels Vehicle Hire | www.samuels.co.nz
thread.title: Rosyied Ab Rahman
thread.title_full: Samuels Vehicle Hire reviewed by Rosyied Ab Rahman

author: Rosyied Ab Rahman
title: Rosyied Ab Rahman
text:
Very very good experience! Car delivered on time by Anna @ Queenstown, and picked up on time by a gentleman (didnt get his name) at Auckland airport.
Becky and Anna was very responsive. Car was in a mint condition. clean, felt almost like a new car.
most importantly, the service provided was top notch! i'm sharing your contacts with all my friends here in Malaysia. thanks again
